Kevoree Kloud work in progress !

December 16, 2011

We prepare for some weeks now Kevoree version 1.5.0 which will be released soon (~ 20 december). This version will include a new framework for building Cloud computing architecture. We prepare an internal cloud demonstration, here are the first pictures of the installation of equipment.[[posterous-content:jinIBztsggcgGCBzAbbc]]
